text: Khi ma TA (Allah) cho con nguoi nem trai hong phuc (cua TA) sau con nguy nan, ngay lap tuc ho am muu chong lai cac Loi Mac Khai cua TA. Nguoi (hoi Thien Su Muhammad) hay noi: “Allah nhanh hon trong chien luoc.” Qua that, cac Su Gia cua TA (cac Thien Than ghi chep) luon ghi chep het moi thu ma cac nguoi am muu.”
